name: Mud Bomb
description: You throw a hard-packed mud ball at a creature. Make a ranged attack, dealing 1d10 + MOVE ground damage on a hit. On a hit, the target must make a CON save against your Move DC. On a failure, the target has disadvantage on its next attack roll. If activating a move that requires a save, the target(s) have advantage.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
